participant_1.background:
I was able to use my fireworks collection to put on an amazing fireworks show for my friends.
i own a custom upholstery shop.
I drive a hybrid car because I want to save the environment for my cats.
My teeth hurt from not chewing my food properly, but I have to move my army to the new camp.
i watch youtube videos.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag to my friends about my massive collection of foreign films.
my favorite book is the tale of genii.
I collect momentos from my favorite concerts.
I'd love to go to a game with my brother and then cook the game we caught.
i am obsessed with my dog.

content.text: What s your favorite thing about yourself?
I would brag to my friends about my massive collection of foreign films.
I love movies! What s your favorite foreign film?
It s called the tale of genii. It s a chinese film.
I m not familiar with that one. What s it about?
It s about a man who travels to a magical world and learns a lot about himself.
That sounds cool! I ll have to check it out sometime.
You should! It s really good.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to concerts and catch the game.
That sounds like fun! I like to go to concerts too.
I love the feeling of getting hyped up with a bunch of people to the same music.
Me too! It s so much fun to be around people who are just as passionate about music as you are.
I also love to go to games and cook the game we caught.
That sounds really fun! I have never been fishing before, but I would love to try it sometime.
It s really fun! You should definitely try it.
